018package org.opengis.metadata.spatial;
019
020import org.opengis.util.CodeList;
021import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
022import org.opengis.geoapi.internal.Vocabulary;
023
024import static org.opengis.annotation.Obligation.*;
025import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.*;
026
027
028/**
029 * Name of the dimension.
030 *
031 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (IRD)
032 * @version 3.1
033 * @since   2.0
034 */
035@Vocabulary(capacity=8)
036@UML(identifier="MD_DimensionNameTypeCode", specification=ISO_19115)
037public final class DimensionNameType extends CodeList<DimensionNameType> {
038    /**
039     * Serial number for compatibility with different versions.
040     */
041    private static final long serialVersionUID = -8534729639298737965L;
042
043    /**
044     * Coordinate (y) axis.
045     */
046    @UML(identifier="row", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
047    public static final DimensionNameType ROW = new DimensionNameType("ROW");
048
049    /**
050     * Abscissa (x) axis.
051     */
052    @UML(identifier="column", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
053    public static final DimensionNameType COLUMN = new DimensionNameType("COLUMN");
054
055    /**
056     * Vertical (z) axis.
057     */
058    @UML(identifier="vertical", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
059    public static final DimensionNameType VERTICAL = new DimensionNameType("VERTICAL");
060
061    /**
062     * Along the direction of motion of the scan point
063     */
064    @UML(identifier="track", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
065    public static final DimensionNameType TRACK = new DimensionNameType("TRACK");
066
067    /**
068     * Perpendicular to the direction of motion of the scan point.
069     */
070    @UML(identifier="crossTrack", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
071    public static final DimensionNameType CROSS_TRACK = new DimensionNameType("CROSS_TRACK");
072
073    /**
074     * Scan line of a sensor.
075     */
076    @UML(identifier="line", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
077    public static final DimensionNameType LINE = new DimensionNameType("LINE");
078
079    /**
080     * Element along a scan line.
081     */
082    @UML(identifier="sample", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
083    public static final DimensionNameType SAMPLE = new DimensionNameType("SAMPLE");
084
085    /**
086     * Duration.
087     */
088    @UML(identifier="time", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
089    public static final DimensionNameType TIME = new DimensionNameType("TIME");
090
091    /**
092     * Constructs an element of the given name.
093     *
094     * @param name  the name of the new element. This name shall not be in use by another element of this type.
095     */
096    private DimensionNameType(final String name) {
097        super(name);
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Returns the list of {@code DimensionNameType}s.
102     *
103     * @return the list of codes declared in the current JVM.
104     */
105    public static DimensionNameType[] values() {
106        return values(DimensionNameType.class);
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Returns the list of codes of the same kind as this code list element.
111     * Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking {@link #values()}, except that
112     * this method can be invoked on an instance of the parent {@code CodeList} class.
113     *
114     * @return all code {@linkplain #values() values} for this code list.
115     */
116    @Override
117    public DimensionNameType[] family() {
118        return values();
119    }
120
121    /**
122     * Returns the dimension name type that matches the given string, or returns a new one if none match it.
123     * This methods returns the first instance (in declaration order) for which the {@linkplain #name() name}
124     * is {@linkplain String#equalsIgnoreCase(String) equals, ignoring case}, to the given name.
125     * If no existing instance is found, then a new one is created for the given name.
126     *
127     * @param  code  the name of the code to fetch or to create.
128     * @return a code matching the given name.
129     */
130    public static DimensionNameType valueOf(String code) {
131        return valueOf(DimensionNameType.class, code, DimensionNameType::new).get();
132    }
133}
